Mod.Name: ProjectHELLFIRE Plus (GF Textures)
Mod.Author: MCINDUS + Slimebucket
Mod.Description:
Project Hellfire - GF Texture replacement mod. Version 2.5 now live! Anohter Alternate Bahamut added
Original mod created by MCINDUS ffnx conversion and extra textures by Slimebucket

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: Version 2.5 - Another Alternate Bahamut added! Version 2 - upscaled textures from 512x512 to 1024x1024 - Alternate bahamut and Brothers added Version 1 5 - alternate Ifrit Added Version 1.0 Straight conversion from Tonberry Mod
